page.title: 15POLITICS
page.content:
There are different parties in politics. To see which party rules the country there has to be an election in which the people vote for the party they want to get into power.The leader of the party which gets into power is the Prime Minister. That person has to form a cabinet.
There are County Councils and District Councils all working for the Government. The County Council is in charge of the County and employs the council workmen, such as the dustbin men. They also run the hospitals and all the people who work for the public. The District Council sees to things like council houses, if the tenants have any complaints.
